To provide you with quality service, adhere to the principle of customer first.

Reminder:

  1. The parts files format we accept for quote: STL (.stl), STEP (.stp), IGES (.igs), PRT(.prt), X_T (.x_t), SolidWorks(.sldprt)
  2. The maximum uploaded file size is 2MB
